name: Kill All Melons | InDev
description:
Controls:

A D or Arrow keys - Movement

Space or W - jump

1 - Toggle CRT effect

M - mute music

Goal:

Kill all melons.

CHANGE LOG

6/21/15 - Version 0.02

Patch note:

  • new control options
  • you can now mute music
  • jumping code re wrote to be more reliable
  • blood now only sticks to floors and walls

6/20/15 - game uploaded
